mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS(O_NUM,ORDERID,P_NUM,C_STOCK) SELECT ORDERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{orderid},P_NUM,C_STOCK FROM CART WHERE M_ID=#{m_id}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDERID,M_ID,O_NAME,O_ADDRESS,O_PHONE,O_AMOUNT,O_DATE FROM ORDERS_DETAIL WHERE M_ID=#{m_id} ORDER BY O_DATE DESC

SELECT D.ORDERID, D.M_ID, D.O_NAME, D.O_ADDRESS, D.O_PHONE, D.O_AMOUNT, D.O_DATE, O.O_NUM, O.P_NUM, O.C_STOCK, P.P_NAME, P.P_PRICE FROM ORDERS_DETAIL D INNER JOIN ORDERS O ON D.ORDERID=O.ORDERID INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON O.P_NUM=P.P_NUM WHERE D.M_ID=#{m_id} AND D.ORDERID=#{orderid}
